ldhood Craniopharyngioma
				            
				                
				                    Newly Diagnosed Childhood Craniopharyngioma
				                    Treatment of newly diagnosed childhood craniopharyngioma may include the following:         -  Surgery (resection) with or without radiation therapy.    - Partial resection followed by radiation therapy.    -  Cyst drainage with or without radiation therapy or surgery.
